standardRuby.commandPath.description:
Absolute path to standardrb executable. Overrides default search order and, if missing, will not run Standard via Bundler or a `standardrb` executable on your PATH.

Supports variables `${userHome}`, `${pathSeparator}`, and `${cwd}`
